text:
Hi there, anyone managed to have system pages (404 for instance) in multi languages?
We use glossary for everything but I see that these pages are not "affected" by it.
Thanks
You can check the url and look for language subfolders then change the verbiage that way
<@U38EZFVFE> I have different domains like .de, .fi, etc. how would it work in this case?
Only one with subfolder is /en, which works fine
You can search for that as well
How would it be in case of different domain like .de, for example?
I'm a bit unsure how it would work with the others
Aaaah, ok, cool! Will try that

you need to get the contacts that are associated with the id using the associations api, that will give you the contact IDs of the associated contacts, then you can query the contact wiht the id to get the email

I would do these things:
I wouldn’t not use any “integrations” items inside HubSpot integrations tab

I would set up some sort of additional module in my header to fire any scripts to deal with the onetrust banner.

Based upon approval or denail of that banner, I’d <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/cookie-banner|drive the options for HubSpot >like on a denial from one trust to send `_hsq.push(['doNotTrack'])``
